title: Digital Light Canvas
blurb: Journey into a fantastical paradise of light & color
description: Immerse yourself in an endlessly interactive dreamscape where exotic flowers magically bloom under each footstep, giant koi fish glide alongside, and all manner of animal life come out to play. Let your imagination soar as you easily create your own masterpiece and even take it home with you. Digital Light Canvas is presented in collaboration with teamLab, the international art collective behind teamLab Future World. This attraction is perfect for families and children of all ages who enjoy interactive art experiences.

title: ArtScience Museum at Marina Bay Sands
blurb: Explore art, science, technology and culture intersection.
description: Explore the intersection between art, science, technology and culture at this local cultural institution. The ArtScience Museum offers a dynamic and engaging experience for visitors of all ages. Discover innovative exhibitions that blend creativity with scientific principles. Perfect for families, students, and art enthusiasts, the museum provides a unique learning environment. Immerse yourself in thought-provoking displays and interactive installations that showcase the wonders of human ingenuity. A captivating destination that inspires curiosity and fosters a deeper understanding of the world around us.
full_address: SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait

title: Sampan Rides at Marina Bay Sands Canal
blurb: Glide along the canal in a charming Sampan boat.
description: Glide along the canal in a charming Sampan boat inspired by those that once filled the Singapore River. Sampan Rides offer a unique and relaxing way to experience the beauty of Marina Bay Sands. Perfect for families and couples, these traditional-style boats provide a gentle journey through the heart of the resort. Enjoy the stunning architecture and vibrant atmosphere as you float along the canal. A delightful activity that captures the essence of Singapore's cultural heritage and offers a memorable experience for all.
full_address: SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait

title: Spectra Light & Water Show at Marina Bay
blurb: Outdoor light and water show evoking Singapore's journey.
description: An outdoor light and water extravaganza evoking Singapore’s journey to becoming a cosmopolitan city. Shows nightly for free at the Event Plaza. Spectra is a mesmerizing display of lights, music, and water effects that tells the story of Singapore's cultural evolution. Perfect for families and visitors of all ages, this free show offers a captivating experience against the backdrop of Marina Bay. Enjoy the stunning visuals and immersive sound as you witness the transformation of Singapore through a dazzling spectacle. A must-see attraction that celebrates the spirit and progress of the nation.
full_address: SKYPARK OBSERVATION DECK Behold panoramic views stretching from the sprawling cityscape to Gardens by the Bay and the Singapore Strait
